mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, BIRTHDATE, HEIGHT, CURRENT_WEIGHT, MAIN_GOAL ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{birthdate}, #{height}, #{currentWeight}, #{mainGoal} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, EMAIL, PASSWORD AS password, NICKNAME, BIRTHDATE, HEIGHT, CURRENT_WEIGHT, MAIN_GOAL FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
